jsonFlow.files.includedFilePatterns.description: File type identifiers to include (e.g., extensions like json, yaml).

jsonFlow.files.excludedFilePatterns.description: Glob patterns to exclude from search (e.g., node_modules, dist, out, build, vendor).

jsonFlow.files.maxSearchRecursionDepth.description: Maximum recursion depth for file search. 0 means no limit.

jsonFlow.files.includeFilePath.description: Show the file path next to the name in the generated files list.

jsonFlow.graph.layoutOrientation.description: Graph layout orientation. TB (top-bottom), LR (left-right), BT (bottom-top), RL (right-left).

jsonFlow.liveSync.selectionThrottleMs.description: Throttle delay (milliseconds) for editor-to-webview selection sync. Set 0 for immediate updates.
